result.execSummary:
The defendant Thomas Arden Harder was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Fine $379.00   Pay obligation within 60 days or apply to the Clerk of Court for a payment plan within 60 days and pay the $15.00 payment plan fee.
DNA surcharge $200.00   Pay obligation within 60 days or apply to the Clerk of Court for a payment plan within 60 days and pay the $15.00 payment plan fee.

judgments.dispoDesc: Fine/Costs $579.00 given 60 dtp or set up payment plan
judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Notice of right to seek postconviction relief.

Defendant Thomas Arden Harder in court with attorney Scott S. Schlough.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Schlough w/draws motion plea reached.  State moved to amend to simple DC 947.01.  Court grants motion to amend.  DE entered NC plea.    DE advised of rights and penalties; DE waives rights; parties stipulate to facts.  court finds defendant guilty.

COURT:  Fine/Costs $579.00 given 60 dtp or set up payment plan

Court orders the defendant to go give a DNA sample today
Motion hearing on April 6, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Thomas Arden Harder in court with attorney Scott S. Schlough.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
DEF atty to file motion.  Status conference scheduled for March 29, 2016 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Thomas Arden Harder in court with attorney Scott S. Schlough.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   DEF Acknowledges receipt of Information.  Not Guilty plea entered.  Status conference scheduled for February 9, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Thomas Arden Harder in court with attorney Scott S. Schlough.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Sgt Nick Al Moghrabi sworn/testifies direct; cross; Probable Cause found,  Arraignment scheduled for January 5, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Thomas Arden Harder in court with attorney Scott S. Schlough.  Defendant Thomas Arden Harder in custody appearing by video.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Bond continues.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for November 24, 2015 at 09:30 am.
No Contact with former Judge Gerald Wright or his residence

Defendant Thomas Arden Harder in court with attorney Scott S. Schlough appeared via phone.  Defendant Thomas Arden Harder in custody appeared via video.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant advised of rights/penalties, acknowledges receipt of complaint, waives reading of complaint.   SIBS $10,000  No Contact with former Judge Gerald Wright or his residence.   DEF waives time limits for Prelimiary hearing.  Scheduling conference scheduled for September 29, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
